activities: Synoptek is a Managed Services provider. Customer data is contained in the information system.   Information is provided at contract initiation or additional users are added.
personaldata: Customer data for identification purposes and storage in the information system. Manually processed data is also covered.
recoursemech: If a Customer complaint cannot be resolved through the Company’s internal processes, the Company will cooperate with JAMS pursuant to the JAMS International Mediation Rules, which are accessible on the JAMS website at www.jamsadr.com/international-mediation-rules.
